com.marcospassos.phpserializer

Class Writer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.marcospassos.phpserializer.Writer

  • public class Writer
extends Object
    Writes a values in PHP's serialization format.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Marcos Passos

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Writer()
      Creates a new writer using an internal buffer.
      Writer(StringBuffer buffer)
      Creates a writer specifying a buffer to write the data to.
